meanings.sent1: The movie played intermissionless, without any breaks.
meanings.sent2: The music played intermissionless throughout the entire concert.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel ran intermissionless across the park, never stopping for a rest.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed intermissionless through the empty hallway.
meanings.sent5: The rain fell intermissionless, creating a soothing sound on the roof.

meanings.sent1: The intermissionless performance kept the audience engaged from start to finish.
meanings.sent2: The intermissionless flow of traffic made the commute faster than usual.
meanings.sent3: The intermissionless line at the ice cream truck made everyone impatient.
meanings.sent4: His intermissionless dedication to his work earned him a promotion.
meanings.sent5: The intermissionless waves crashed against the shore, creating a mesmerizing sight.
